Our App

Company

Contact

Students too often choose between good health and good grades.
Our day planning app helps students balance their assignments and todos without sacrificing
sleep, while giving teachers what they need to set manageable expectations for the classroom.

Our Philosophy:

We believe that wellness and
productivity are inseparable.

Students and young professionals especially have trouble balancing school-work, life, and wellness. As a result, college campus are witness to a steady decrease in the quality of student mental health. We believe our holistic approach to productivity can change the culture of work to be more considerate of wellness for students and young professionals.

{{ currentStat.title }}

{{ currentStat.details }}

How it Works

Pi Daily is a day planner that connects with learning management
systems like Moodle and Blackboard to help students
balance school, life, and wellness.

About the Company

PiXYZ is a wellness design and technology company building
products, services and brands that help young people
lead productive, mission driven lives.

Jordan Bradley, Founder

After his award winning pitch at MICA's inaugural business competition, Jordan set out to build PiXYZ, a wellness technology company dedicated to improving the culture of work for young people.

Mentors

DeVaris Brown, CircleUp

Through strategic vision and technical expertise founded in years of work at companies like Microsoft, Intel, and Cisco, DeVaris helps start-ups reach their goals.

Trenton Nettles, Arizona State

As a wellness educator at ASU, Trenton helps young people achieve work-life balance through specialized wellness, leadership, and diversity programming.
